title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
description: Customer is unable to log in to their account. They've tried resetting their password multiple times but still facing issues.

title: Payment Gateway Timeout
description: Payment is not going through for some users. They receive a timeout error at checkout.

title: Unable to Upload Documents
description: Customer cannot upload verification documents. The upload button is unresponsive.

title: Mobile App Crashing
description: iOS app crashes on startup for version 3.2.1.

title: Email Notifications Delayed
description: System emails are being delivered hours late. Customers are complaining about delays.

title: Dashboard Not Loading
description: Customer dashboard is stuck on loading screen after login.

title: Two-Factor Authentication Not Working
description: 2FA codes are not being sent to the user's mobile device.

title: Slow Website Performance
description: Website loading time has increased significantly for multiple users.

title: Password Reset Link Expired
description: Customers report that the password reset link expires too quickly.

title: Subscription Renewal Failed
description: Recurring subscription renewal payments are failing for some customers.
